ComicInfo.Summary:
As Bond struggles with the fallout of the previous issue's shock ending, all bets are off. Double and triple crosses and being in bed with the enemy - sometimes literally - are the order of the day. Has Bond truly become no different than the members of SPECTRE he is now working for, or does he have a master plan that can work against impossible odds?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Aaron Lopresti | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Aaron Lopresti | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Aaron Lopresti | 3 | D/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Aaron Lopresti | 4 | E/RE | Premium Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 5 | F/FOC | 1:11 FOC "Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 6 | G/FOC | 1:15 FOC "Virgin Black & White Art" Edition Variant Cover | Luca Casalanguida | 7 |
